summary: Marc Cros, an elderly sculptor, lives with his wife Lea in the south of France, safe from the War that rages in the distance. He seems to have reached the end of his life and of his art. ... See full summary »
cast: Jean Rochefort|Aida Folch|Claudia Cardinale|Chus Lampreave|Götz Otto|Christian Sinniger|Martin Gamet|Mateo Deluz|Simon Guibert|Alain Torrent|Michel Jaquesmin|Dorian Astrou|Albam Riou|Guillaume Virag|Sarah Villesvieille|Aniol Llop|Anna Julia Chafer|Liam Chafer|Aniol Cañada|Berta Cañada|Carla Brunsó|Aina Bramona|Sergi Comerma|Jan Aranda|Marc Fernandez|Pol Fernandez|Mireia Masdeu|Adrià Andurell|Quim Güell|Genís Cros|Miquel Puig|Ramon Codina|Agustí Planadecursach|Michel Brigand
title: El artista y la modelo
